title: Health System Template
description: Defines healthcare in a sovereign power including life expectancy, magical healing availability, medical knowledge level, common diseases, and mental health understanding. Medical care quality should not be too convenient; instant healing removes tension.

life_expectancy.description: Average life expectancy (pre-modern settings rarely above 30)

quack_remedies.description: Prevalent false cures and snake oil

mental_health_understanding.description: How mental health is understood and treated -- possessed by demons, confined in asylum, or compassionately treated

convalescence_norms.description: Whether instant healing is possible or convalescence is required -- removing tension is bad storytelling

childhood_survival_rate.description: Percentage reaching adulthood (historically as low as 60%) -- affects family size and marriage age

common_health_beliefs.description: Common health-related beliefs, some true and some false

x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: This system belongs to a sovereign power
x-cross-references.religion-profile: Religious healing may supplement medical care
x-cross-references.magic-system-overview: Magical healing is governed by the magic system
